titles.title: Pokopon no Yukai na Saiyuuki
ぽこぽんのゆかいな西遊記

anime.description: Pokopon and friends plays a funny version of Journey to the West. Note: Screened along http://anidb.net/a3073 [Kero Kero Keroppi no Daibouken] and http://anidb.net/a7780 [Hello Kitty no Oyayubi-hime] at the second Sanrio Sekai Meisaku Eigakan theatrical road show.

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
